name: after the meteor shower
description:
A very fun and challenging game! It's important to remember to always be cautious and observe your surroundings as you explore the unknown planet. Try to make the most of your skills and available resources to overcome enemies and find parts for your ship. Don't forget to collect as many screws as possible and avoid the steel-eating bacteria. I wish you the best of luck on your journey and hope you manage to repair your ship and return home safe and sound!


The game has 40 levels, most with sub-levels.
several different enemies, monster bosses, etc...
3 difficulties that can be saved simultaneously.
68 passes approx.
